free_text.Learning outcomes: In this course, I will provide a comprehensive knowledge of the econometric tools that are essential to estimate financial models, both for asset pricing and for forecasting purposes. I will focus on the empirical techniques used most often in the analysis of financial markets and how they are applied to actual market data. [br/]
free_text.Content: The different topics I will treat are the following:[br/][1] Characteristics of Financial Time Series [br/][2] Modeling Financial Market Volatility[br/][3] Modeling Non-normality[br/][4] Extreme Value Theory[br/][5] Modeling Correlation[br/][6] Risk Management and Asset Allocation[br/]

free_text.Contenu: The different topics I will treat are the following:[br/][1] Characteristics of Financial Time Series [br/][2] Modeling Financial Market Volatility[br/][3] Modeling Non-normality[br/][4] Extreme Value Theory[br/][5] Modeling Correlation[br/][6] Risk Management and Asset Allocation[br/]

I will focus on the empirical techniques used most often in the analysis of financial markets and how they are applied to actual market data. [br/]
